definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: In mathematical logic in the study is the main target of all kinds of calculus.
sentences.chinese: 在數理邏輯中研究的主要對象是各種演算。

sentences.english: Mr. Fang, have you ever studied mathematical logic?
sentences.chinese: 方先生，你對數理邏輯用過功沒有？

sentences.english: It finds relationships and differences of all kinds of transitional complex sentences by way of mathematical logic.
sentences.chinese: 通過數理邏輯手段揭示轉折複句子類間的聯繫變化。

sentences.english: Methods Based on the semantic theory of nonclassical logic.
sentences.chinese: 方法非經典數理邏輯的語義理論。

sentences.english: Therefore, intelligence inference should not be based upon the orthodox mathematical logic.
sentences.chinese: 因此，情報推理不能以正統數理邏輯作爲推理工具。

sentences.english: Consistency is one of the most fundamental syntactic concepts in mathematical logic.
sentences.chinese: 協調性是數理邏輯中最基本的語法概念之一。

sentences.english: I don't understand the complicated mathematical logic calculation.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白這複雜的數理邏輯運算。

sentences.english: Traditional logic is utterly different from mathematic logic in principle.
sentences.chinese: 從主導思想上說，傳統邏輯和數理邏輯殊異。
